name: outcome_calculation_method_updated
definition: The event is emitted anytime an outcome_calculation_method is updated by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when an outcome_calculation_method is updated.

schema.outcome_calculation_method_id: The Canvas id of the outcome calculation method.
schema.context_type: The type of context the outcome calculation method is used in.
schema.context_id: The id of the context the outcome calculation method is used in.
schema.workflow_state: Workflow state of the outcome calculation method. E.g active, deleted.
schema.calculation_int: Defines the variable value used by the calculation_method. Included only if calculation_method uses it.
schema.calculation_method: The method used to calculate student score.

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
